title: Asset
description: Metadata used to describe an asset on the server.

contributor.title: Contributors
contributor.description: Contributors to this item: persons or organizations.

about.title: Subject matter of the dataset
about.description: The subject matter of the content, such as disorders, brain anatomy.

studyTarget.title: Study Target
studyTarget.description: Objectives or specific questions of the study.

license.description: Licenses associated with the item. DANDI only supports a subset of Creative Commons Licenses (creativecommons.org) applicable to datasets.
license.title: License

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: A list of persistent URLs describing the protocol (e.g. protocols.io, or other DOIs).

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords used to describe this content.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.descriptions: Any acknowledgments not covered by contributors or external resources.

wasGeneratedBy.title: Name of the session, project or activity.
wasGeneratedBy.description: Describe the session, project or activity that generated this asset.

digest.title: A map of dandi digests to their values

dateModified.title: Asset (file or metadata) modification date and time

blobDateModified.title: Asset file modification date and time.

identifier.title: A ror.org identifier
identifier.description: Use an ror.org identifier for institutions.

identifier.title: An ORCID identifier
identifier.description: An ORCID (orcid.org) identifier for an individual.

name.title: Name
name.description: Use the format: familyname, given names ...

roleName.title: Role
roleName.description: Role(s) of the contributor. Multiple roles can be selected.

includeInCitation.title: Include contributor in citation
includeInCitation.description: A flag to indicate whether a contributor should be included when generating a citation for the item.

awardNumber.title: Identifier for an award
awardNumber.description: Identifier associated with a sponsored or gift award.

affiliation.title: Affiliation
affiliation.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with.

url.title: URL
url.description: A Web page to find information on how to contact.

identifier.title: A ror.org identifier
identifier.description: Use an ror.org identifier for institutions.

roleName.title: Role
roleName.description: Role(s) of the contributor. Multiple roles can be selected.

includeInCitation.title: Include contributor in citation
includeInCitation.description: A flag to indicate whether a contributor should be included when generating a citation for the item

awardNumber.title: Identifier for an award
awardNumber.description: Identifier associated with a sponsored or gift award.

Disorder.title: Disorder
Disorder.description: Biolink, SNOMED, or other identifier for disorder studied

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

Anatomy.title: Anatomy
Anatomy.description: UBERON or other identifier for anatomical part studied

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

GenericType.title: Generic Type
GenericType.description: An object to capture any type for about

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

EthicsApproval.title: Ethics Approval
EthicsApproval.description: Information about ethics committee approval for project

identifier.title: Approved protocol identifier
identifier.description: Approved Protocol identifier, often a number or alphanumeric string.

contactPoint.title: Contact Point
contactPoint.description: Information about the ethics approval committee.

AccessType.title: AccessType
AccessType.description: An enumeration of access status options

AccessRequirements.title: Access Requirements
AccessRequirements.description: Information about access options for the dataset

status.title: Access status
status.description: The access status of the item.

contactPoint.title: Contact Point
contactPoint.description: Who or where to look for information about access.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about access requirements when embargoed or restricted

repository.title: Name of the repository
repository.description: Name of the repository in which the resource is housed.

relation.title: Resource relation
relation.description: Indicates how the resource is related to the dataset. This relation should satisfy: dandiset <relation> resource.

identifier.title: Research resource identifier
identifier.description: RRID of the software from scicrunch.org.

name.title: Name of session
name.description: The name of the logical session associated with the asset.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the session.

used.title: Used
used.description: A listing of equipment used for the activity.

name.title: Name of project
name.description: The name of the project that generated this Dandiset or asset.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the project.

used.title: Used
used.description: A listing of equipment used for the activity.

used.title: Used
used.description: A listing of equipment used for the activity.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value associated with this property.

propertyID.title: Property ID
propertyID.description: A commonly used identifier forthe characteristic represented by the property. For example, a known prefix like DOI or a full URL.

SampleType.title: Sample Type
SampleType.description: OBI based identifier for the sample type used

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

AssayType.title: Assay Type
AssayType.description: OBI based identifier for the assay(s) used

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

StrainType.title: Strain Type
StrainType.description: Identifier for the strain of the sample

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

SexType.title: Sex Type
SexType.description: Identifier for the sex of the sample

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

locus.title: Locus
locus.description: Locus at which information was extracted.

alleles.title: Alleles
alleles.description: Information about alleles at the locus.

wasGeneratedBy.title: Was Generated by
wasGeneratedBy.description: Information about session activity used to determine genotype.

SpeciesType.title: Species Type
SpeciesType.description: Identifier for species of the sample

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier can be any url or a compact URI, preferably supported by identifiers.org.

name.title: Name of the participant or subject

url.title: URL of the related participant or subject

relation.title: Participant or subject relation
relation.description: Indicates how the current participant or subject is related to the other participant or subject. This relation should satisfy: Participant/Subject <relation> relatedParticipant/Subject.

Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description:
Description about the Participant or Subject studied.

The Participant or Subject can be any individual or synthesized Agent. The
properties of the Participant or Subject refers to information at the timepoint
when the Participant or Subject engaged in the production of data being described.

strain.title: Strain
strain.description: Identifier for the strain of the participant or subject.

cellLine.title: Cell Line
cellLine.description: Cell line associated with the participant or subject.

age.title: Age
age.description: A representation of age using ISO 8601 duration. This should include a valueReference if anything other than date of birth is used.

sex.title: Sex
sex.description: Identifier for sex of the participant or subject if available. (e.g. from OBI)

genotype.title: Genotype
genotype.description: Genotype descriptor of participant or subject if available

species.title: Species
species.description: An identifier indicating the taxonomic classification of the participant or subject.

disorder.title: Disorder
disorder.description: Any current diagnosed disease or disorder associated with the participant or subject.

relatedParticipant.title: Related Participant
relatedParticipant.description: Information about related participants or subjects in a study or across studies.

sameAs.title: Same as
sameAs.description: An identifier to link participants or subjects across datasets.

BioSample.title: Bio Sample
BioSample.description: Description of the sample that was studied

sampleType.title: Sample Type
sampleType.description: Identifier for the sample characteristics (e.g., from OBI, Encode).

assayType.title: Assay Type
assayType.description: Identifier for the assay(s) used (e.g., OBI).

anatomy.title: Anatomy
anatomy.description: Identifier for what organ the sample belongs to. Use the most specific descriptor from sources such as UBERON.

wasDerivedFrom.title: Was Derived From
wasDerivedFrom.description: Describes the hierarchy of sample derivation or aggregation.

wasAttributedTo.title: Was Attributed to
wasAttributedTo.description: Participant(s) or Subject(s) associated with this sample.
